Title: Object: Repose in Egypt
Series: Stafford Gallery
Description: Plate 42: Rest on the flight into Egypt, after Annibale Carracci: landscape with in the left foreground the Virgin sitting on a river bank with Christ Child sleeping on her lap, two kneeling angels adoring Christ, and two others hovering above and scattering flowers; on the left, Joseph leading the ass Etching, with image pasted onto sheet bearing the inscriptions
Curator's comments: From 'Engravings of the Most Noble the Marquis of Stafford's Collection...', see 1860,0211.552 for comment. A composition similar to the Hermitage tondo by Annibale Carracci; see Posner 142.
